Question: Guangzhou Chiyang Scent Technology Co.,Lt CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Chiyang Scent Technology Co., Ltd.

Aroma Diffuser

- Scenta New Design Bluetooth Control Electric Essential Oil Diffuser
- Wall Mounted Auto Cool Mist Spray Smart Hotel Aroma Diffuser
- Scenta Commercial Large Capacity Metal Design HVAC Air Scent System Waterless Essential Oil Electric Aroma Diffuser Machine
